entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 24. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
